title: Ebro In The Morning - Secret Obama Party + Respect the LOX
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 8/9.

Ebro and the crew discuss if the new Kanye will come out (18), Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (12 & 58), and you find out who played themselves. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

SUMMER JAM PODCAST GIVEAWAY RULES: 

Giveaway Rules: Once a week, we will be giving away two pairs of Summer Jam tickets on the Ebro In The Morning Podcast - to enter the contest, the listener must do 3 things:

1. screenshot the podcast app while the contest ad is playing 

2. Follow @EBROINTHEAM& Tweet the password "SUMMER JAM SURPRISE" to @Ebrointheam along with why you want to go to Summer Jam - best reason wins.

3. Include the hashtag Summer Jam - #SummerJam

4. Winners will be announced on the later this week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
